metadata.title: apache-commons-net: FTP client trusts the host from PASV response by default (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Apache Commons Net's FTP, where the client trusts the host from PASV response by default. A malicious server could redirect the Commons Net code to use a different host, but the user has to connect to the malicious server in the first place. This issue could lead to leakage of information about services running on the private network of the client.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
